text:
TicketCity | Austin, TX | Full Stack (mid-level or senior) | Onsite

We are an eCommerce marketplace for live events (sports, concerts, theater).

If you get sh*t done and love working on a close-knit dev team, we want you!

Our stack: Javascript, jQuery, Angular, React, MS-SQL, MongoDB, ElasticSearch, Node.js, .NET, Objective-C

https://jobs.lever.co/ticketcity/5a194cda-d136-4ddf-abb1-6bd...

Feel free to email me (Caitlin) at csullivan@ticketcity.com to learn more about the role or life at TicketCity in general.
